span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 懦弱，不坚定： lack of courage or resolution
【例】 cowardice in the face of danger 面对危险时的懦弱
【近】 cravenness, dastardliness, gutlessness, poltroonery, pusillanimity, spinelessness
【反】 courage, guts, pluck , intrepidness, nerve, stoutness, valiance, valor 勇气
【派】coward n. 懦夫

【记】 cow + ward, toward 象牛一样
